TextEng: You're free to go, certainly.
<StartAction>[Lie]</Start> Hilltop is in ruins. You don't want to go there.
Text: <StartAction>[거짓말]</Start> 힐탑은 폐허야. 거기 가고 싶지 않을 거야.

TextEng: I don't really care where you go, just go.
That's a good idea. Go to Hilltop... you'll be safe there.
Text: 좋은 생각이야. 힐탑으로 가... 거기선 안전할 거야.

TextEng: My name is unimportant.
Give thanks to the gods and that will be enough recognition for me.
My name is <FirstName>.
My name is <FirstName>. And here... 100 gold to help you rebuild your lives.
Text: 내 이름은 <FirstName>이야. 그리고 이거... 새 삶을 시작하는 데 보태 쓰라고 금화 100개야.

TextEng: Hilltop is safe. In fact, I'll take you there myself.
Text: 힐탑은 안전해. 사실, 내가 직접 데려다 줄게.

TextEng: Actually, I think I'm in need of some target practice.
Text: 사실, 과녁 연습이 좀 필요할 것 같은데.

TextEng: And what will you give me to let you go?
I apologize. The way is clear... you're free to leave.
Go, then. I could not care less, really.
Sounds to me like you need to be put out of your misery.
Text: 내가 보기엔 고통에서 해방시켜 줘야 할 것 같은데.

TextEng: Are you really that certain?
First tell me who you are and how you got here.
Text: 먼저 네가 누군지, 어떻게 여기 왔는지 말해 봐.

TextEng: Forget it. Rot here, for all I care.
Of course... you're free to go.
I've driven the gnolls from the cave, that's true.
Wait... who are you people? What are you doing here?
Text: 잠깐... 너희 누구야? 여기서 뭐 하는 거야?

TextEng: Don't back-talk me, slave, or suffer the consequences!
Text: 말대꾸하지 마, 노예 주제에, 안 그러면 대가를 치를 거야!

TextEng: And so what if I did? What are you going to do about it?
Text: 그래서 내가 그랬다면? 뭘 어쩔 건데?

TextEng: I've arranged for peaceful passage through these caves, no more.
Text: 이 동굴을 평화롭게 통과할 수 있게 해뒀어, 그게 다야.

TextEng: I'd have to deal with the guards, first...
There are no guards here... you should be able to flee safely.
Text: 여기 경비병 없어... 안전하게 도망칠 수 있을 거야.

TextEng: I will try to speak to the chieftain, then.
No, you're right... I can't do that. You'll have to stay here.
Text: 아니, 네 말이 맞아... 그럴 수 없어. 여기 있어야겠어.

TextEng: Yes, I am. You should go now, quickly!
Sorry... I'm not willing to make the gnolls angry.
Text: 미안하지만... 놀들을 화나게 할 생각은 없어.

TextEng: I will speak to the chieftain about this.
Perhaps... if you make it worth my while.
Fine, fine. I will speak to the chieftain.
I've taken control of the gnolls, but I didn't make you slaves.
Text: 놀들을 장악했지만, 너희를 노예로 만든 건 아냐.

TextEng: I suppose I could, at that. Very well... you're free to go.
Text: 그럴 수 있을 것 같네. 좋아... 자유야.

TextEng: You're free to go. The way is clear.
What do I care? Come or go, as you wish.
Text: 내가 뭔 상관이야? 가든 말든, 알아서 해.

TextEng: Not yet, but be patient.
